heroText1: I turn ideas into functional projects
aboutMeDesc1: I am a full stack developer in training, passionate about building useful tools that solve real-world problems. I enjoy combining intuitive design with solid functionality, working on projects ranging from personal systems to full web applications.
aboutMeDesc2: I enjoy learning new technologies and applying them to create practical solutions, such as custom web tools or interfaces connected to databases. I strive to write clean, practical, and maintainable code.
